channel.title: Request: IP Flooder/Server Crasher
channel.description:
[b]Don't expect much from an IP Flooder/Server Crasher, it honestly doesn't do much.[/b] This is a simple crasher. Doesn't have many options. It's easy to use. [center][b]Credits:[/b][/center][center]Laz: 40% - Made main prgm base. Natalie: 30% - Worked on the IP flooders. Imaginary: 20% - Re-made/Build new Flooding Engines[/center][left][i]In case for some of you who do not have any experience in the use of this program at all & you guys just want to use it for fun and too mess around with someone's server; when it asks you to input the[b] HOST[/b] it's obviously asking you for the IP of the server.[/i][/left]
[right]When it asks you to input a [u]"command"[/u] you do not necessarily have to put one you could just press enter and skip that. As well as if you don't want "[u]spam"[/u] you could just enter and skip a line like I said before. [/right] [left][b]IMPORTANT:[/b] you could use the IP Flooder/Server crasher while in-game but after like 20 seconds of use you will lag badly and will cause for you to disconnect out of the server.[/left][center]Well that's all there is to explain about this program. Have fun and obviously enjoy! Link: * Oh! & Make sure to extract the folder.[/center]

item.title: Request: IP Flooder/Server Crasher
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

We don’t condone this stuff here.

Read full topic

item.title: Request: IP Flooder/Server Crasher
item.dc:creator: @Imaginary Imaginary
item.description:
@Imaginary wrote:

Don’t expect much from an IP Flooder/Server Crasher, it honestly doesn’t do much.
This is a simple crasher.
Doesn’t have many options.
It’s easy to use.
[center]Credits:[/center][center]Laz: 40% - Made main prgm base.
Natalie: 30% - Worked on the IP flooders.
Imaginary: 20% - Re-made/Build new Flooding Engines[/center][left]In case for some of you who do not have any experience in the use of this program at all
& you guys just want to use it for fun and too mess around with someone’s server;
when it asks you to input the HOST it’s obviously asking you for the IP of the server.[/left]

[right]When it asks you to input a “command” you do not necessarily have to put one you could just press enter and skip that.
As well as if you don’t want "spam" you could just enter and skip a line like I said before. [/right]
[left]IMPORTANT: you could use the IP Flooder/Server crasher while in-game but after like 20 seconds
of use you will lag badly and will cause for you to disconnect out of the server.[/left][center]Well that’s all there is to explain about this program.
Have fun and obviously enjoy!
Link: *
Oh! & Make sure to extract the folder.[/center]

Read full topic
